DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct prospective study 132 patient undergoing benign parotid surgery department . Their primary objective analyze incidence contribute factor associate temporary permanent postoperative facial palsy strictly standardize method facial nerve function evaluation . Also complication occur within 12 month operation record .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients underwent parotid surgery Department Otorhinolaryngology - Head Neck Surgery , Helsinki University Hospital , Helsinki , Finland , September 2011 November 2012 prospectively enrol . Exclusion criterion age 18 , suspicion malignancy facial schwannoma , tumor extend parapharyngeal space , previous parotid surgery expose facial nerve .
DOC.criteria: parotid gland tumour surgery age 18 suspicion malignancy facial schwannoma tumor extend parapharyngeal space previous parotid surgery expose facial nerve
